description: Time to eat Astronomers watched in real time as the supermassive black hole at the center of a galaxy went from dim and quiet to bright and actively feeding on material, Adam Mann reported in “For the first time, scientists witness a black hole turning on” (SN: 7/13/24 & 7/27/24, p. 7). Reader Chris Sheppard […]
title: Readers discuss black holes’ trippy effects on time, banned swimsuits

description: Editor in chief Nancy Shute discusses the complexity of chronic pain, the spread of diseases and training crocs to avoid eating certain toads.
title: When pain really is in your head
